posts.name: Çağan
posts.cooked: Where and how do we use PID in teleop?

posts.name: Tom
posts.cooked: It depends on your PID values… the docs for wpi are pretty decent for explaining how to tune PID

link_counts.title: Tuning a PID Controller — FIRST Robotics Competition documentation

user_custom_fields.user_field_4: 5554 - Alumni. Former head of software, strategy and development

posts.name: Tom
posts.cooked: PID isn’t something you use in teleop only, it is something you use all the time for controlling systems. It should be used to accurately control systems, for example elevators, arms, drive speeds, drive position. PID is a algorithm for minimizing error.

posts.name: Mert Ata BABER
posts.cooked:
Çağan, it would be better if you keep your questions on the same topic in the same post. You can use the reply button to respond to a post.

Çağan, aynı konu üzerindeki sorularını tek bir gönderide tutman daha iyi olur. Bir gönderiye yanıt vermek için “reply” butonunu kullanabilirsin.

posts.name: UnofficialForth
posts.cooked: Often, slip is due to trying to exceed a robots maximum acceleration. If you ask it to accelerate too fast, either when speeding up or slowing down, the wheels brake traction and will cause slip. Thus, slip in the sense it’s referred to in FRC isn’t controlled by PID constants.

user_custom_fields.user_field_4: FRC Team 4272  Mentor | World's FLL Emcee

posts.name: GaryVoshol
posts.cooked: 3 threads on the same topic have been combined in this one.

Can you provide more information on what the PID is for? You suggest slipping and turning which could be a case where a slew rate limiter is needed. However, please confirm whether this is a drivetrain related issue or not.

PID ’nin ne için olduğu hakkında daha fazla bilgi verebilir misiniz? Kayma ve dönüşten bahsediyorsunuz, bu da bir dönüş hızı sınırlayıcısının gerekli olduğu bir durum olabilir. Ancak, bunun bir aktarma organıyla ilgili sorun olup olmadığını lütfen teyit edin.

user_custom_fields.user_field_4: Doubling the current limit does not make it work.

posts.cooked:
(posting this to resolve the mistranslation)

four:

Can you provide more information on what the PID is for? You suggest slipping and turning which could be a case where a slew rate limiter is needed. However, please confirm whether this is a drivetrain related issue or not.

PID sistemini neden kullanmak istediğin hakkında detay verir misin? “Slipping” ve “Turning” yaşandığını söyledin, bunun engellenmesi için “slew rate limiter” kullanman gerekebilir. Ama bundan önce lütfen sorun’un sürüş sisteminde(drivetrain) olup olmadığını söyler misin?

(Tr)Ek olarak, @Myth sana özelden Türkçe FRC gruplarına davet attım, eğer Türkçe sorun var ise orada sorabilirsin.

(En)Also, I’ve sent a private message to you for the Turkish FRC community, you can ask any questions you might have in there.
